Sequence Information.Peptide Name: LaIT3 (natural AMPs; scorpion toxins, arachnids, Chelicerata, arthropods, invertebrates, animals; 3S=S, UCSS1a)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is most similar (45.5%) toscorpion Scorpine. Mol Wt:  9201.757; GRAVY: -0.446; Mol Formula: C404H657N112O116S7, mol ex coeff: 10395.Activity: Active against E. coli NBRC 3972 (agar diffusion method). The killing is likely achieved via the N-terminal helical region (predicted). 7/2021
Literature Information.Author: Juichi H, Miyashita M, Nakagawa Y, Miyagawa H.2019
Literature Information.Title: Isolation and characterization of the insecticidal, two-domain toxin LaIT3 from the Liocheles australasiae scorpion venom
